title: Chapter 4356 - Chapter 4356: 4355 On The Space Beast Of The Hunting Great Dao
body:
Chapter 4356 - Chapter 4356: 4355 On The Space Beast Of The Hunting Great Dao

Chapter 4356: 4355 on the space beast of the Hunting Great Dao

Translator: 549690339

“Boom Boom Boom!”

In an instant, countless attacks attacked the Heaven and Earth Devouring Beast Emperor below.

Below, the incomparably huge heaven and Earth Devouring Beast Emperor sensed these terrifying attacks. It raised its head and revealed an expression of shock and anger.

Its pupils emitted an intense luster. It opened its huge mouth and directly spat out a strange space.

It seemed to have spat out a space from its mouth.

Meanwhile, the body of the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor strangely shifted to an extremely distant position at the back.

Wang Xian and the rest’s attacks all missed!

“Huh?”

Wang Xian’s eyes narrowed slightly when he saw this move of the heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast Emperor.

His body moved and instantly moved to the front of the heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast Emperor!

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

When the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor saw that Wang Xian was attacking him again, it let out an angry roar.

It opened its mouth and spat out the teeth formed from energy. It charged toward Wang Xian.

Wang Xian opened his dragon mouth and slashed out terrifying swords of light.

“Bang! Bang! Bang!”

The intense sounds of collision rang out. The teeth that contained powerful attack power were directly cut off.

Numerous swords of light continued to attack the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor.

Numerous swords of light landed on its body, leaving many scars.

“Roar!”

The heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast Emperor was in pain. It shook its huge body and wanted to escape.

It could sense Wang Xian’s strength and could sense that it was not Wang Xian’s match.

“Nine-origin Dragon Realm!”

When Wang Xian saw the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor trying to escape, his eyes narrowed. The nine-colored Divine Dragon Realm covered it!

At the same time, chains were wrapped around the heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast Emperor!

The divination lamp was hovering by his side, performing divination!

“Attack!”

“Divine Dragon’s Breath!”

Beisheng Mosha and the rest also rushed over quickly.

Beishou and the rest of the divine dragons spat out terrifying dragon’s breath and attacked the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor.

“Demon’s curse, tear!”

Mosha stared at the wound of the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor and streams of black energy flew towards it.

When the black energy met the wound, it transformed into a ferocious claw and began to tear the wound and corrode it!

“Attack with all your might!”

Wang Xian predicted from the divination lamp that the heaven-devouring beast emperor would not use any means to escape in the short term. He immediately roared loudly!

In the sky above him, a gigantic leader swooped down and charged at the heaven-devouring Beast Emperor!

“Woo Woo!”

Xiao Lan and the rest opened their mouths and let out roars.

The gray energy on their bodies condensed into countless fish.

Each fish had sharp thorns that were hundreds of meters long!

Chaos also used his innate ability.

The two tentacles above his head shone.

Mountains were pressing down on the heaven-devouring Beast Emperor!

All kinds of attacks were coming!

“Roar!”

“Roar!”

The heaven-devouring Beast Emperor felt the threat and opened his mouth.

His mouth seemed to have turned into an abyss in an instant, devouring all the attacks!

Be It Wang Xian’s attacks or Mo Sha’s attacks, all of them fell into his abyss mouth.

“Roar!”

After devouring, he let out a painful sound.

A large amount of blood oozed out from the wound on his back. It was a little more serious.

However, these injuries were not fatal!

“HMM? He actually absorbed all the attacks directly and only suffered a little damage?”

Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly when he saw this scene.

This space beast indeed had a strong vitality.

It was able to absorb the attacks that were four times stronger than its own body!

“Kill!”

Wang Xian shouted in a low voice. He shook his gigantic dragon tail and attacked the heaven-swallowing Earth Beast Emperor once again.

On his dragon tail, the energy of the Tai Chi Dragon Disc and the five elements millstone rotated and stacked on top of each other!

“Roar!”

When the heaven-swallowing Earth Beast Emperor saw this attack, it let out a loud roar in shock and anger. It opened its mouth and bit towards the void at the side.

The void at the side was directly bitten into his mouth.

Following that, he threw it at Wang Xian’s attack.

The dragon tail swept across the void. Wang Xian instantly felt that his attack seemed to hit the air.

And the heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast Emperor seemed to be in a different space from him!

“Attack the right side with all your strength. Attack the place I marked!”

At this moment, Wang Xian used the divination lamp to divine that the heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast King wanted to escape. He immediately gave the order.

At the right side of Wang Xian’s Mark, a bright spear appeared and pierced towards that direction!

Mo Sha and the rest followed the order and attacked that location as well.

When they launched their attack, the body of the heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast King had already appeared there strangely.

It spat out a strange void, and its attack method was very strange.

“Bang! Bang! Bang!”

However, under the divination lamp’s prediction, this attack directly landed on its enormous body.

This caused a large number of wounds to appear on the body of the heaven-devouring Beast Emperor!

“Ao! Ao! Ao!”

The heaven-devouring Beast Emperor was a little crazy. He stared at Mo Sha and the others with a dense gaze.

He opened his mouth.

An incomparably huge mouth enveloped mo sha and the rest.

“Be careful. This move of his is very terrifying. We were instantly swallowed by this move of his.”

Liu Lan Wangtian was shocked when he saw this move. He immediately roared loudly!

“Don’t be afraid. Gather together and defend together!”

Mo sha shouted loudly and gathered everyone together. Xu Ying in his body expanded and enveloped everyone within it.

Bei Shuang and the rest immediately unleashed their defenses.

“HMPH, you have many tricks up your sleeve. However, you will die today!”

Wang Xian stared at the heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor with a grim expression. He waved his dragon claws and clawed at it.

The gigantic dragon claws landed on the body of the heaven-swallowing earth-eating Beast Emperor.

Streams of energy circulated around its body and blocked Wang Xian’s attack.

However, this heaven-swallowing earth-eating beast emperor was much weaker than Wang Xian.

It was easier said than done to block it.

A large number of wounds appeared on his body once again!

“Roar! Roar!”

He let out a cry from his pupils again!

His pupils revealed a look of horror!

“Roar!”

He raised his head and a huge mouth that seemed to be able to devour the world appeared!

The huge mouth enveloped Wang Xian and the rest!

Even the real body of the heaven-devouring earth-devouring beast emperor was enveloped by the huge mouth!

The world turned dark as if everything was being devoured!

Wang Xian stared at this strange attack and looked at the divination lamp!

“Attack its real body!”

Wang Xian shouted and continued to give orders to Mo Sha and the rest.

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom

All kinds of attacks were directed at the main body of the heaven-devouring earth-devouring beast!

Bang! Bang! Bang

The attacks landed on his body, causing more and more wounds to appear on his body.

However, at this moment, Wang Xian felt that the world had turned dark.

The heaven-devouring earth-devouring beast king in front of him had mysteriously disappeared!
